channel.title: Plans on ERIK.VAN.CRADDOCK
channel.description: Recent content in Plans on ERIK.VAN.CRADDOCK

item.title: Goals and Plans for 2016
item.description: When it came time to review how things went in 2015, I had a hard time. I had nothing to work with because I did not set any goals and plans at the beginning of the year. The only valuable thing I was able to do was list out the areas where I did not do so well. This year will be different. I have set a number of goals and plans for myself.
